vsParam:
Let me see...
The habitat of the Emperor Merman should be near here...

Yes, footprints...
And, there are many of them.

Hmm...
Could these be traces of the Emperor Merman...?

Very likely...
Put aside the footprints, there are very few fishes here.

So it means... this thing is getting complicated.
The Emperor Mermen may be gregarious.

Ah ah ah ah ah, what should we do, Logy?
We can't fight so many enemies at the same time...!

You're right. It's better to avoid any head-on confrontation.
... So.

[px].
I have a request. Can you please make a power bomb?

Our quest is to "strike down the Emperor Merman",
instead of killing the entire species.

Disturb the school with bombs, and then catch one
that is left alone. This is the most efficient way.

Indeed...!
I like this operation plan!

So, [px]!
Please help prepare a super-powerful bomb~!!

Sorry, I can't help with this...
Please do this for us, [px].
